Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav top-scored with 53 off 28 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 3-7 and Arshdeep Singh 3-36
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan: 'We could've done it had we executed smarter'
India captain Rohit Sharma: 'Everyone came in and did their job'
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was a Super 8s Group One match in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
The match was played in Barbados
Others: The next match in this Super 8s group is Bangladesh v Australia at 01:30 BST
